CHALLENGE 1: REVERSE A STRING
Return a string in reverse.
ie. reverseString('hello') === 'olleh'
return str.split('').reverse().join('');
or
return str.split('').reduce((revString, char) => char + revString);
CHALLENGE 2: REVERSE AN INTEGER
Return a string in reverse.
ie. reverseInt('123') === '321'
return ( parseInt ( int.toString().split('').reverse().join('') ) * Math.sign(int));
Math.sign(int) keeps the negitive symbol if needed.
CHALLENGE 3: FizzBuzz
Log 1-100 except swap out every 3rd number for Fizz and 5th for Buzz.
ie. 1, 2, Fizz, 4, Buzz, 6 ect
for (let i = 0; i <= 100; i++) {
   if (i % 3 === 0 && i % 5 === 0) {
     console.log('FizzBuzz');
   } else if (i % 3 === 0) {
     console.log('Fizz');
   } else if (i % 5 === 0) {
     console.log('Buzz');
  } else {
     console.log(i);
  }
}
